DOC.criteria: Healthy , HIVnegative volunteer Currently active chronic cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , pancreatic , gastrointestinal , neurologic , hematologic , psychiatric , metabolic , respiratory , inflammatory , infectious disease Chronic pancreatitis History rhabdomyolysis History statinassociated myopathy Active malignancy History significant skin disease , food allergy , drug allergy , dermatitis , eczema , psoriasis Pregnancy/breastfeeding HIV positive and/or AIDS serum creatinine grade 1 great ( ≥ 1.1 x upper limit laboratory normal range [ ULN ] ) ; hemoglobin grade 1 great ( ≤ 10.9 g/dL ) ; platelet count grade 1 great ( ≤ 124.999 x 109/L ) ; absolute neutrophil count grade 1 great ( ≤ 1.3 x 109/L ) ; aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) grade 1 great ( ≥ 1.25 x ULN ) ; total bilirubin grade 1 great ( ≥ 1.1 x ULN ) serum lipase grade 1 great ( ≥ 1.1 x ULN ) serum amylase grade 1 great ( ≥ 1.1 x ULN ) laboratory abnormality grade 2
